name: Minified Share Box on Google Plus
description: This style trims down the share box in the Google+ to only the sharing icons. The box will expand like normal when you click on one of them.
additional_info:
Updated 2013-10-02 21:42 PST - Height tweak for new layout.
Updated 2013-07-05 9:38 PST - Removed redundant text box, saving another 25px.
